headline.main: 11 to 1: Etan Patz Jurors Nearly Unanimous in Guilty Verdict
headline.print_headline: 11 to 1: Etan Patz Jurors Nearly Unanimous in Guilty Verdict

docs.snippet: After 18 days of deliberations that included lengthy testimony read back, dozens of pieces of evidence and a computer spreadsheet to keep it all straight, the jury in the 1979 disappearance of Etan Patz surrendered in an agonizing stalemate: 11-1....
docs.lead_paragraph: After 18 days of deliberations that included lengthy testimony read back, dozens of pieces of evidence and a computer spreadsheet to keep it all straight, the jury in the 1979 disappearance of Etan Patz surrendered in an agonizing stalemate: 11-1.

headline.main: San Bernardino to Release Bankruptcy Exit Plan on May 14
headline.print_headline: San Bernardino to Release Bankruptcy Exit Plan on May 14

docs.snippet: Almost three years after declaring bankruptcy, the southern California city of San Bernardino will issue its long-awaited bankruptcy exit plan on Thursday, May 14, the city mayor said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Almost three years after declaring bankruptcy, the southern California city of San Bernardino will issue its long-awaited bankruptcy exit plan on Thursday, May 14, the city mayor said on Friday.

headline.main: Colombia Officials Say Stolen Garcia Marquez Book Recovered
headline.print_headline: Colombia Officials Say Stolen Garcia Marquez Book Recovered

docs.snippet: Colombia's National Police force says authorities have recovered a valuable first edition copy of Gabriel Garcia Marquez's masterpiece "One Hundred Years of Solitude."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's National Police force says authorities have recovered a valuable first edition copy of Gabriel Garcia Marquez's masterpiece "One Hundred Years of Solitude."

headline.main: 'Re-Homing' Couple Exposed by Reuters Is Indicted on Kidnap Charges
headline.print_headline: 'Re-Homing' Couple Exposed by Reuters Is Indicted on Kidnap Charges

docs.snippet: An Arizona couple who used an underground online market for acquiring children has been charged with kidnapping two minors and transporting one across state lines with intent to engage in sexual activity....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Arizona couple who used an underground online market for acquiring children has been charged with kidnapping two minors and transporting one across state lines with intent to engage in sexual activity.

headline.main: Judge Blocks Recall Attempt Against Indicted Washington State Auditor
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Recall Attempt Against Indicted Washington State Auditor

docs.snippet: Washington state auditor Troy Kelley, who pleaded not guilty last month to charges of tax evasion and lying to federal agents, will not have to face a recall effort as he fights the charges, a state judge ruled on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington state auditor Troy Kelley, who pleaded not guilty last month to charges of tax evasion and lying to federal agents, will not have to face a recall effort as he fights the charges, a state judge ruled on Friday.

docs.snippet: Bus bearing image of former Soviet leader Joseph Stalin drives through St. Petersburg, as Russia celebrates the 70th anniversary of the WWII victory. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bus bearing image of former Soviet leader Joseph Stalin drives through St. Petersburg, as Russia celebrates the 70th anniversary of the WWII victory. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.main: US Regulators Close Small Chicago Bank
headline.print_headline: US Regulators Close Small Chicago Bank

docs.snippet: Regulators have closed a small bank in Chicago, marking the fifth failure of a federally insured bank 2015....
docs.lead_paragraph: Regulators have closed a small bank in Chicago, marking the fifth failure of a federally insured bank 2015.

headline.main: WWII Aircraft Fly Over National Mall

docs.snippet: As part of the celebrations on Friday to mark the 70th anniversary of the end of the Second World War, dozens of vintage aircraft from the era flew over the National Mall....
docs.lead_paragraph: As part of the celebrations on Friday to mark the 70th anniversary of the end of the Second World War, dozens of vintage aircraft from the era flew over the National Mall.

headline.main: US: Work Permits Issued After Immigration Action Delayed
headline.print_headline: US: Work Permits Issued After Immigration Action Delayed

docs.snippet: The U.S. government says it "erroneously" awarded three-year work permits to 2,000 people under President Barack Obama's executive immigration action after a judge had put the plan on hold....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. government says it "erroneously" awarded three-year work permits to 2,000 people under President Barack Obama's executive immigration action after a judge had put the plan on hold.
